eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: Eyjafjalla spends a dreamy night with two Little Black Sheep resembling her parents, a scene of midnight fantasy.

attributes.content: The setting sun seems to be the last customer of the small shop. The one behind the counter is no longer a familiar old man, but a coffee-colored creature.
It cranks a grinder handle, and the aroma of coffee wafts into the air with bits and pieces of finely ground beans.
A record spins slowly as a loudspeaker sings leisurely.
Oh, welcome.
attributes.name: Coffee-colored Creature

attributes.content: I don't think I saw you earlier. Are you new here?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I think so, because I don't have any memories from yesterday. I don't know why I'm here, but I thought I'd make a cup of coffee... Oh, would you like one?
attributes.name: Coffee-colored Creature

attributes.content: Coffee has a nimbly wonderful flavor that comes only when you brew by hand. Now let's see... where did I put those newly arrived beans? I should have stored them myself...
attributes.name: Coffee-colored Creature

attributes.content: Seems like it's behind some kind of guitar. Hm... talk of guitars is suddenly making me a little angry. How odd, what's got my heart frazzling?
attributes.name: Coffee-colored Creature

attributes.content: Guitar? Angry? Are you okay?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Never mind. Maybe it's because that guitar looks a bit boring.
attributes.name: Coffee-colored Creature

attributes.content: Please, sit anywhere you like. The one you're waiting for will soon be here.
attributes.name: Coffee-colored Creature

attributes.content: The one I'm waiting for...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Are you waiting? Or is the other? I can't tell.
attributes.name: Coffee-colored Creature

attributes.content: Oh, you're here.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: I... remember you.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Good evening, Adele. So sorry I'm late—did you remember to have breakfast today?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Yes, I did.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Huh? Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Good girl.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: You've changed your clothes. are you ready?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Clothes...? Huh, isn't this Mutti's coat...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Pack your things and let's go shopping. We'll go buy some things we need to climb a volcano.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The sun inches down bit by bit as the streetlamps along the path light up like stars. Adele's vision is a little fuzzy, as if she has seen a sky like this somewhere, sometime before.
Was there a short street in that small town on Leithanien's southern border, or on the road back home from her school in her memories?
She can even remember the smell of the air then. Slightly moist, with a hint of sunshine and plants growing, exactly the same as now.
Is this your shopping mall?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Yes. We have to make some preparations before we climb the volcano.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: I know there's many things we need to bring. A compass, protective clothing, a camera... A tent and some flint too, if we're camping overnight.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No, we won't need those in here.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: First, we need to buy enough 'knowledge,' 'courage,' and 'curiosity.' Check the prices before buying one of each, and lastly buy a little 'luck.'
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: But 'luck' is very expensive, and often the fastest to sell out, so it's alright to skip it if you don't have the budget.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy creature shakes itself, and several soda bottle caps fall from her wool. They clink and tinkle into the merchant's pouch.
Thank you for your generosity!
attributes.name: Shrewd Creature

attributes.content: Hm... I may need to buy a bit more 'courage.'
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: I have enough 'courage' to climb the volcano, but I need a bit more 'courage' to leave home.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The fluffy critter shakes itself again, more caps falling out. The merchant opens its pouch, waiting for more.
Not enough, not enough.
attributes.name: Shrewd Creature

attributes.content: If the pouch isn't full, I can't give you 'courage,' if the pouch isn't full.
attributes.name: Shrewd Creature

attributes.content: If you don't manage to buy 'courage', will you be able to climb the volcano?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's alright, Adele. Things like this happen all the time. I've gradually become used to finding 'courage' by and for myself.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Adele, let's get moving. We must be careful on our journey, and look after our things well.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Things? But I didn't bring anything with me.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Someone wants to steal the 'photograph.'
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Follow me, and keep an eye on my package, okay?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: What did you just say? I didn't catch that...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We can't go on like this Adele. Here, for you.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The cuddly creature shakes itself, and a fluff of wool falls out.
What's this...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Go on, put it on your ear, and you'll be able to hear.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Now, we have to find the next one.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: There is yet another fluffy critter covering a window in front of him with photographs. He turns his head at the sound of footsteps.
His fluffy back fidgets repeatedly, covering the window full of photos.
Oh, um... you two... you're finally here.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: We have much to prepare. How's the weather looking?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The sky is full of thick clouds, I'm afraid it might rain soon.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Do we still have time?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Not much left. We'll need to hurry.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Adele looks at the sky without a cloud in sight.
Do you need me to buy an umbrella?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No, Adele. Look, I'm an umbrella.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: We can't let the 'photograph' get wet, or be stolen. I'll keep it safe in my package.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: What is this 'photograph' you're talking about?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Shh. I hope you never find out.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: And if you do, that it happens far, far in the future.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The solemn creature lowers his head.
Let's go. We'll head upwards in a bit, and that's where we want to go.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: You don't have enough wool yet, Adele. here, this is mine.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Eh...? O-Okay.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The two creatures seem to have shrunk a little, and Adele looks just like one of them.
Um... Oh! The wool seems to be bumping me upwards?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: That means our trip is about to begin.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: How's the view up there?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Always great before the rain falls.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: And how are you feeling?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: ...Always great before the rain falls.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: And you, Adele?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Hm, you seem to be in a good mood?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The petite critter follows them, skipping and hopping.
Along the street, the lights, the clouds and the stars, it tries its best to get higher and higher.
Wow... I think it's gotten stronger.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Will it come with us?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy critter doesn't answer, and she bites onto a corner of Adele's coat. Clink, clank, they step on the lights.
Adele feels as if she's flying. People are come and go on the street—no, it is sheep that are moving to and fro.
——Oh! Be careful, you might run into someone.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: They're selling flowers up ahead! I need to hurry.
attributes.name: Merry Creature

attributes.content: No need to rush still, your rainbow is all crooked. Here, let me help you straighten it.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Alright, off you go.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Thank you, see you, so long!
attributes.name: Merry Creature

attributes.content: Little Black Sheep shuffle through the streets one after another, going in and out of shops. The streets at night have taken on a different look.

Adele turns her head to look for her two companions who were separated by the waves of Little Black Sheep. As soon as she turns, she is greeted by the sight of two fluffy creatures quietly standing right behind her.
It is as if they have been waiting here for countless years.
Adele, you have to plant a pebble when you return this time.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: A pebble?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Yes, just like we did with a small hunk of rock before.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: We buried it in the ground, which was originally in a very dark shade, until it met many different kinds of rocks.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Let me guess. Because you bought a lot of 'luck' for it?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The two fluffy critters continue jumping upwards, towards the sky, seeming more distant than ever.
Adele stands in between, her hands outstretched holding onto their wool.
Well... that is one reason, but the important bit is that I water it with 'love' everyday.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: And 'memories.'
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Can you buy those in shops too?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No, little one. 'Love' and 'memories' are our own treasures.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: They will grow on the paths you tread, in your embraces, and on the cheeks you kiss.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: But sometimes they go unnoticed, so we always have to work hard to find them.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: That little stone traveled through many mountains underground, and followed the rivers through many a place.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Knocking and bumping into things, and finally we realized, we had no idea where it had gone. We lost it.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Then, are you two... sad because of that?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We feel regret.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Perhaps we shouldn't have planted it, or maybe we should have planted it somewhere we could see.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Every little stone is unique, and we lost what was ours.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: But I recall that it turned into lava in the end, warm and piping hot, and we all loved it.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Yes, we loved it.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Then, that's all right... It managed to turn into lava in the end, and you didn't forget it.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I think this little stone was already fortunate enough.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Maybe it's a dream. A dream, a story.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: A story circling in my head, that needed us to tell you about it.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Then, if you ever meet this rock again one day, do you think you'll be able to recognize it?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele, my little rascal.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Will we still recognize it?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: No, it has already turned into beautiful lava. Red hot lava rushing forward, never to look back again.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: We will never ever meet it again, we will only be at its back.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: It will go to places we have never been, to see sights we have never seen.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: And all we need is to remember this story, to tell it to you. You'll also have to plant your own little pebble, and then watch it take root and sprout, watch it go far away.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Look, Adele. We've reached the peak.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The little stones have already turned into lava. The eruption is about to begin.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Is this story about to end too?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Not at all, this is just the beginning.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: It will turn into a cloud, and then fall back to the ground.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: It will no longer be a rock, but a handful of warm and white volcanic ash.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: It is the little stones turning into nutritious volcanic ash that allows the land to bloom.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Our little stone will return. Someday, when that happens, we'll be able to see it again.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Will that be a long time, or will it be soon...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Maybe we don't know.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Come, Adele. Hold onto me, we too will turn into clouds, and then fall back to the earth.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: We're going to fly down together.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Adele hugs the creature by her side, and tries making a step—
She falls downwards, but it is slow and light, as if she is floating.
She sees her hair flying around her, the other Little Black Sheep lightly jumping around the lights of the shops.
The wool on her body holds her up, enveloping her. An experience already in the depths of her childhood memories, her parents hold her up, and throw her into the sky to catch the stars above.
She falls onto the wool, fluffy and soft beneath her. The stars fall into her eyes, and her eyes grow hot.
Shadows come and go on the street, and Adele tries to get on her feet, wanting to share this fantastic feeling with the two fluffy creatures by her side.
Phew... I...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Where are we going next?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I spotted many more little shops in the distance when we were above earlier. Should we go around and take a look?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'll go look for places where we can find more bottle caps, so we can buy more of the things we want.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele's breathing quickens with her excitement.
The Little Black Sheep from earlier mentioned a flower shop just ahead. My mother used to always place some flowers by my bed when I was young. Do you like flowers?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Those small and white flowers, that look like you two.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Look, just like the one on that Little Black Sheep.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy creatures fall silent, no longer replying.
The stars in the sky dim, and then light up as they open their mouths.
Little one...
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: I know, the bedside flowers do smell really good. I love them too.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Then I'll buy some and make garlands for you!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Just wait for me here, I haven't made one in a long time, I...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The remainder of Adele's words choke in her throat. She realizes the fluffy critters have stopped following her, the flowers and leaves from her staff fluttering around the two.
They take a few steps back, their figures melting into the night.
No, Adele. We have to go.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The clouds have gathered, and will never again disperse.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Yes. It's time.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We have to head back up the volcano before it starts to rain.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Up the volcano.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Don't go to the volcano... you'll...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No, Adele. The rain will soon fall.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: If we don't go, everything we've done before will be for naught.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: You will drown if you stay somewhere low.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Adele, you have to go to the peak.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: It has a beautiful view, and also the truth.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Adele, I hope that you can stay pure and focused.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.text: This land is not at all pure, but there shouldn't be anything disturbing the heart of someone keen for answers.
We want to expand the boundaries of what humanity knows, together with you.
We're working our hardest for this reason, and you'll definitely stand on our shoulders to see a clearer and lovelier land.

attributes.content: Adele...
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: So long, Adele.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature
